content: In CDA the "EncompassingEncounter" is optional, yet in FHIR it is stated that for documents Composition.encounter SHALL be included - why is that?
I'm not sure, that might be an oversight on my part
I raised ticket to have this looked at. http://gforge.hl7.org/gf/project/fhir/tracker/?action=TrackerItemEdit&tracker_item_id=9809
